dialogToMypage.title: Welcome to MyMedi!
dialogToMypage.contents: Would you like to fill up your profile to enjoy a better service?

intro.title: Why MyMedi?
intro.sum-intro: MyMedi is a medical schedule management service for multicultural families in the medical blind spot.

sub1.title: Why multicultural family?
sub1.contents: As a result of data analysis, it was confirmed that the vaccination rate of children from multicultural families was lower than that of children from other families.

sub2.title: Why is it low?

contents.1: The reasons were linguistic limitations and missed timing due to not knowing the recommended schedule for vaccination.
contents.2: In addition, it was confirmed that health/welfare is the next highest priority issue in Korea's foreigner consultation, while the main issues are immigration and labor.

sub2.imageAlt: Statistics of counseling contents for foreigners residing in Korea

sub3.title: Why web service?
sub3.contents: You can see that the proportion of phone calls is the highest among the Seoul Global Center counseling methods. It can be seen that there is a tendency to prefer phone calls that provide direct information, non-face-to-face, to receive counseling in a variety of languages. That's why we decided to build a calendar and notification web service that supports internationalization.
sub3.imageAlt: Seoul Global Center Consultation Method Statistics

sub4.title: In what languages ​​is internationalization supported?
sub4.contents: In addition to Korean and English, Vietnamese was added by referring to the nationality rankings of multicultural families nationwide.
sub4.imageAlt: Statistics on nationality of multicultural families
